# R Markdown

## Libraries
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}
tidy_lib <- function(lib) {
  if (!require(lib, character.only = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(lib)
  }
  library(lib, character.only = TRUE)
}
tidy_lib("tidyr")
tidy_lib("dplyr")
tidy_lib("lubridate") 
tidy_lib("readr")
tidy_lib("purrr")
tidy_lib("ggplot2")
```

## Read ball by ball data csv
```{r}
odis_bbb_recent <- read.csv("../data/processed/odi_bbb_recent.csv")
```

## Filter dataframe for wickets only
```{r}
wicket_data <- odis_bbb_recent %>%
  filter(wicket_type != "") %>%
  separate(ball, into = c("over", "ball_"), sep = "\\.", convert = TRUE)
```

## Plot frequencies
```{r}
ggplot(wicket_data, aes(x = ball_)) +
          geom_bar()
```
